meanings.definition: A member of a group represented by an elected official.
meanings.sent1: In our town, the constituents rely on the mayor to voice their concerns.
meanings.sent2: The constituents of the organization gathered to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent3: The constituents decided to elect a cat as their representative for fun.
meanings.sent4: The team captain viewed each player as vital constituents of their success.
meanings.sent5: The constituents, like puzzle pieces, fit together to form a strong community.

meanings.sent1: Water and flour are the main constituents of bread.
meanings.sent2: The various constituents of the machine work together to make it function.
meanings.sent3: The cake's constituents rebelled and refused to mix properly.
meanings.sent4: Laughter and joy are essential constituents of a happy life.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully selected the constituents of her masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A voter in a particular district.
meanings.sent1: The constituents lined up to cast their votes in the election.
meanings.sent2: As a constituent, it is important to stay informed about political issues.
meanings.sent3: The constituents decided to have a dance-off to determine the winner.
meanings.sent4: Each constituent's vote is a valuable piece of the democratic process.
meanings.sent5: The constituents proudly displayed their 'I Voted' stickers.
